attributes.action: Give the British people a greater say in who is selected to stand as an MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this time of great disdain against MPs due to their thoughtless expense claims, it is about time that EVERYONE, and not just local party members in their constituency had a say in who can be selected to stand and represent them in Parliament.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
